subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which kingdom was known as Rajputana?
question_hi: राजपुत्तंगाँ क्या राज्य कहा गया था?
explanation_en: Jaipur, also known as Amber, was the capital of Rajputana. Amber is a historical city in Rajasthan and was the seat of the Kachwaha Rajput clan.
